variable.name: RW_WOR5
variable.description: NOW I AM GOING TO SPELL A WORD FORWARD AND I WANT YOU TO SPELL IT BACKWARDS. THE WORD IS WORLD. W-O-R-L-D. PLEASE SPELL IT IN REVERSE ORDER. (LETTERS ARE ENTERED AND SCORED LATER)

variable.name: MM5_1
variable.description: WHAT IS THE DATE TODAY? (MONTH,DAY,YEAR) (SCORE 1 POINT FOR EACH CORRECT ANSWER)
variable.value: UNKNOWN OR DID NOT TAKE THE TEST

variable.name: MM5_2
variable.description: WHAT IS THE SEASON? (SCORE 1 POINT FOR CORRECT ANSWER)
variable.value: UNKNOWN OR DID NOT TAKE THE TEST

variable.name: MM5_3
variable.description: WHAT DAY OF THE WEEK IS IT? (SCORE 1 POINT FOR CORRECT ANSWER)
variable.value: UNKNOWN OR DID NOT TAKE THE TEST

variable.name: MM5_4
variable.description: WHAT TOWN, COUNTY AND STATE ARE WE IN? (SCORE 1 POINT FOR EACH CORRECT ANSWER)
variable.value: UNKNOWN OR DID NOT TAKE THE TEST

variable.name: MM5_5
variable.description: WHAT IS THE NAME OF THIS PLACE? (SCORE 1 POINT FOR CORRECT ANSWER)
variable.value: UNKNOWN OR DID NOT TAKE THE TEST

variable.name: MM5_6
variable.description: WHAT FLOOR OF THE BUILDING ARE WE ON? (SCORE 1 POINT FOR CORRECT ANSWER)
variable.value: UNKNOWN OR DID NOT TAKE THE TEST

variable.name: MM5_7
variable.description: I AM GOING TO NAME 3 OBJECTS. AFTER I HAVE SAID THEM I WANT YOU TO REPEAT THEM BACK TO ME. REMEMBER WHAT THEY ARE BECAUSE I WILL ASK YOU TO NAME THEM AGAIN IN A FEW MINUTES: APPLE,TABLE,PENNY. (SCORE 1 POINT FOR EACH CORRECT ANSWER)
variable.value: UNKNOWN OR DID NOT TAKE THE TEST

variable.name: MM5_8
variable.description: WHAT ARE THE 3 OBJECTS I ASKED YOU TO REMEMBER A FEW MOMENTS AGO? (SCORE 1 POINT FOR CORRECT ANSWER)
variable.value: UNKNOWN OR DID NOT TAKE THE TEST

variable.name: MM5_9
variable.description: WHAT IS THIS CALLED? (WATCH) (SCORE 1 POINT FOR CORRECT ANSWER)
variable.value: UNKNOWN OR DID NOT TAKE THE TEST

variable.name: MM5_10
variable.description: WHAT IS THIS CALLED? (PENCIL) (SCORE 1 POINT FOR CORRECT ANSWER)
variable.value: UNKNOWN OR DID NOT TAKE THE TEST

variable.name: MM5_11
variable.description: PLEASE REPEAT THE FOLLOWING: "NO IFS, ANDS, OR BUTS." (SCORE 1 POINT FOR PERFECT RESPONSE)
variable.value: UNKNOWN OR DID NOT TAKE THE TEST

variable.name: MM5_12
variable.description: PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING AND DO WHAT IS SAYS (PERFORMED=1)
variable.value: UNKNOWN OR DID NOT TAKE THE TEST

variable.name: MM5_13
variable.description: PLEASE WRITE A SENTENCE (PERFORMED=1)
variable.value: UNKNOWN OR DID NOT TAKE THE TEST

variable.name: MM5_14
variable.description: PLEASE COPY THIS DRAWING (PERFORMED=1)
variable.value: UNKNOWN OR DID NOT TAKE THE TEST

variable.name: MM5_15
variable.description: TAKE THIS PIECE OF PAPER IN YOUR RIGHT HAND, FOLD IT IN HALF WITH BOTH HANDS, AND PUT IT IN YOUR LAP (SCORE 1 POINT FOR EACH CORRECTLY PERFORMED ACT, CODE 6 IF LOW VISION)
variable.value: UNKNOWN OR DID NOT TAKE THE TEST
